messages.body: $AAPL John Giannandrea unexpectedly stepped down as Google's AI chief on Monday. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-apple-inc-aapl-snags-googles-head-of-a-i/

links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Snags Google's Head Of A.I.
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has made a major move to bolster its ranks on the artificial intelligence front and weakened a fellow tech giant in the process. The company has hired Google's head of AI to run its "machine learning and A.I. strategy." CNBC has the details on the new addition to team Apple.

$AAPL Apple is working on touchless control and a curved iPhone screen

links.title: Apple Working on Touchless Control and Curved iPhone Screen
links.description: Apple Inc. is working on touchless gesture control and curved screens for future iPhones, projects that may help the company differentiate its most-important product in an increasingly crowded market, according to people with knowledge of the matter. The control feature would let iPhone users perform some tasks by moving their finger close to the screen without actually tapping it.
